programme.title: OJ Simpson and the legal process, 1994
programme.short_synopsis: The OJ Simpson trial, and the Long Island commuter train shootings.
programme.medium_synopsis: A mass shooting on a Long Island commuter train, the OJ Simpson trial and the litigation involved in becoming a US citizen lead Cooke to discuss the legal process in America.
